titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on pigment preparations based on cerium sulfide or mixtures of cerium sulfide and lanthanum sulfide.
A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on pigment preparations based on cerium sulfide or mixtures of cerium sulfide and lanthanum sulfide.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description for cerium sulfide pigments; and (2) extend the temporary suspension of duty on such article.
